CustomField.description: Refers to the user who is responsible for working the opportunity to close. The Opportunity Originator is where you add the RM employee that started the opportunity. This can be changed once a record is saved.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Refers to the user who is responsible for working the opportunity to close. The Opportunity Originator is where you add the RM employee that started the opportunity. This can be changed once a record is saved.
